alert.note: Alert for Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 3:29PM CDT until April 19 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR WESTERN LEE COUNTY... At 328 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms was located near Dixon, Harmon, and southwest of Amboy, all moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Dixon, Amboy, Franklin Grove, Ashton, Sublette, Woodhaven Lakes, Harmon, Woodland Shores, Eldena, Lee Center and Nachusa. This includes... Lee County Fairgrounds. Including the following interstate... I-88 between mile markers 47 and 70. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
